name: Define Core Concepts
description: Identify and abstract the fundamental ideas and themes that need to be communicated to the audience, ensuring they are understandable across different contexts.
purpose: Ensures that the foundational elements of the subject matter are clearly understood and can be effectively conveyed.
applicability_notes: Applicable when explaining complex or novel topics to a broad audience.

name: Structure Narrative Arc
description: Outline the progression of the content, including the beginning, rising action, climax, falling action, and resolution, in a manner that is engaging and logical for the intended format.
purpose: Creates a coherent and compelling flow for the information, enhancing audience engagement and comprehension.
applicability_notes: Essential for any content that aims to tell a story or guide an audience through a sequence of information.

name: Identify Key Information Points
description: Determine the specific pieces of information that are crucial for conveying the core concepts within the defined narrative structure.
purpose: Ensures that all essential details are included and prioritized for effective communication.
applicability_notes: Useful for ensuring comprehensive coverage of a topic without overwhelming the audience.

name: Determine Content Constraints
description: Identify and document any limitations or requirements that will shape the content, such as format length, platform specifications, or resource availability.
purpose: Ensures that the content is feasible and optimized for its intended delivery medium and context.
applicability_notes: Crucial for projects with specific delivery channels or time limits.
